main event: One round white object, the size of a basketball, was observed traveling west for approximately 4.1 minutes in Marshalltown, Iowa.
interesting points: The object was white and round, resembling the size of a basketball,The observer noted that the object traveled in a straight line,The object faded from sight after 4.1 minutes of observation,The officer concluded it could be caused by an aircraft or a balloon,The report was part of Project Blue Book, investigating unidentified flying objects.
witness description: The observer saw the object while outdoors.
